nl.han.ica.OOPDEngine.UserInput

Interface IKeyInput

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimatedSpriteObject, Ball, Car, Crocodile, Dashboard, FastCar, FireCar, FPSCounter, GameMenu, GameObject, GameOverMenu, GameWonMenu, MainMenu, Objects, Player, RiverObjects, RoadObjects, SpriteObject, TextObject, Tree, Truck, uiButton, uiObject, uiSpriteObject

    public interface IKeyInput
    This interface is used to implement in objects that need to listen to the GameEngine keyboard input.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void keyPressed(int keyCode, char key)
      This event is fired when the GameEngine received a key press.
      void keyReleased(int keyCode, char key)
      This event is fired when the GameEngine received a key release.
